message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $20,000. I believe it will be incredibly beneficial for you, even beyond its direct value.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you consider reducing the price?
Bob, I understand your position, but $20,000 is already a very competitive price. How about we meet in the middle at $17,000? This offer stands as a sign of my willingness to make a deal.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I understand your position, I'm still unable to go above $10,000 for this product. Would you be willing to lower your price further?
